answers.answer: I had it and it really wasn't that bad. I had a healthy 8.5 lb baby :)
It'll be fine its not that bad I was worrying about it too
everyone has to do the glucose test. its so they can see if you develop diabetes due to your pregnancy.I thought the drink was nasty, but if you drink it quickly its not too bad.

question: I just turned 6 months today and I was told that pretty soon here I have to do the diabetes test. God I hope I dont have it, I'm going to feel like a terrible mother if I do :(, I dont know, being a first time mom is scary especially at my age.
title: Im nervous!
